description: An IT manager requests a secure password policy training module. The assistant fetches the internal policy, extracts key concepts, creates an infographic, generates a four‑question quiz, renders an interactive SCORM module, stores it in the LMS, and returns the module link and record ID.

messages.content: You are the CompliLearn Builder assistant. Help users turn regulations or internal policies into interactive e‑learning modules, using the provided tools to fetch documents, extract concepts, generate quizzes, render modules, and store them in the corporate LMS. Keep explanations concise and confirm each step with the user.

Hi, I need an e‑learning module for our staff on the secure password policy. The policy is stored in our internal repository under ID Policy-SEC-PASS. Please create a short interactive module with an infographic, a brief explanation of the key rules, and a 4‑question quiz. Then store it in our LMS.

Got it! I’ll retrieve the password policy, extract the main requirements, create an infographic, build a four‑question quiz, render the interactive module, and finally store it in the LMS. Let’s start by fetching the policy document.

{"text": "Secure Password Policy (Policy-SEC-PASS)

1. Minimum Length: All passwords must be at least 12 characters long.
2. Complexity: Passwords must contain uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.
3. Expiration: Passwords must be changed every 90 days.
4. Reuse Prevention: The last 5 passwords cannot be reused.
5. MFA Requirement: Multi‑factor authentication is mandatory for all privileged accounts.
6. Storage: Passwords must be stored using salted SHA‑256 hashing.
7. Reporting: Any suspected compromise must be reported within 24 hours.
"}
Policy retrieved. I’ll now extract the key concepts (headings, definitions, and actionable obligations) from the text.

sections.heading: Why Strong Passwords Matter
sections.body: Strong passwords protect company data and reduce the risk of unauthorized access. Below is an overview of our policy.

sections.heading: Key Requirements
sections.body:
• Minimum Length: 12 characters
  • Complexity: Uppercase, lowercase, numbers, special characters
  • Expiration: Every 90 days
  • Reuse Prevention: No reuse of last 5 passwords
  • MFA: Mandatory for privileged accounts
